articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Russia interested in involving India, Iran to bring peace in Afghanistan: Foreign minister Lavrov - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: MOSCOW: Emphasising that international mediators can play a significant role in Afghanistan, Russia has said that it is interested in involving India .
articles.content: Russia interested in involving India, Iran to bring peace in Afghanistan: Foreign minister Lavrov

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Covid-19 surges will prolong South-East Asia's job crisis, says ILO - The Star Online
articles.description: Rising Covid-19 cases and a slow pace of vaccinations will likely prolong the labor-market crisis in South-East Asia and hamper the region’s recovery, according to the International Labour Organisation (ILO).
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Aug 14 (Bloomberg): Rising Covid-19 cases and a slow pace of vaccinations will likely prolong the labor-market crisis in South-East Asia and hamper the regions recovery, according to the I… [+1440 chars]

articles.title: 34-year-old Singaporean doctor dies after 8-year battle with epilepsy - AsiaOne
articles.description: After having to live with a serious epileptic condition for the past eight years, a young Singaporean doctor succumbed to the rare neurological disorder on National Day (Aug 9), leaving her grieving husband and family to cope with the loss. Prior to her death…

articles.title: Newborn dumped in rubbish truck: Taiwanese woman says she panicked after baby slipped out - AsiaOne
articles.description: She was just born but already thrown out like the trash. The body of a baby girl, with placenta attached, was discovered by a rubbish truck operator in New Taipei, Taiwan, on Thursday (Aug 12) morning. He was about to crush the rubbish when he spotted the pla…

articles.title: Unvaccinated school staff, non-government employees in contact with students to undergo regular Covid-19 tests from Oct 1 - AsiaOne
